title: Best vacation everüëçüèª
text: From the moment you arrive at the lobby you know that it will make a good experience for the attention of its staff, the hotel its facilities are very clean and the rooms are also very comfortable, in the buffet you can find a good variety of food and desserts and if they are served by Ivan and Adrian will see that they are very well trained to give the best service they can offer, in the Italian restaurant they can find very good food and a variety of wines to eat with them and if Rogelio attends them, say hello from me because he is an excellent waiter That people like him will not disappoint you. They make business a success . Here I share a few photos and I hope you enjoy your stay as I did.

title: Nice for a walk üëçüèª
text: Walk from my hotel to the Cancun Sign was very nice stop by xoxo buy a beer a keep walking through the Avenida and see the sunset omg

title: Delicious Food üëçüèª
text: We went to this restaurant in the heart of Cancun and the food was so delicious fresh and the ambient the guy with the margaritas in his head awesome,the mariachis singing all night I recommend this place for a good time and delicious food.

title: Beautifully Beach
text: We spend all day at Holbox island and the experience was so fun and the beach so clean we visit 3 island that day and all the expectation that we want was over the top I recommend this tour you never going to get bored .

title: Excelent service
text: For us the punctuality is the most important and this company for sure is I recommend this transportation clean cars good driver willing to help you good communicator.

title: Window shopping
text: For a nice walk between al de aisle and see store or buy something good bars nice aquarium,and security is strong

title: Nice Resort
text: After read all review I decide to make reservation to this hotel and I can complaint the service was so good the food is yummy people always willing to help you,Pool warn and nice to swimming room clean and best Beth can you find in all Cancun.

title: All about History
text: a spectacular site its ruins full of history a very pleasant place to walk and see everything there is a lot of information for the tourist that you can use as a guide

title: Good for the price
text: Hotel is well located near bars and restaurants that you can find everything like Acropolis and other attractions, the hotel is clean, good breakfast and its employees are always attentive to always help.

title: Awesome attraction
text: a unique attraction where you can travel part of the history of Ferrari and ride your main attraction reaching super fast speeds

title: Paradise
text: excellent resort with its turquoise water beaches its staff always well attentive and willing to help in all its buffet restaurants with its always fresh and good meals the pool area is awesome to hang out late night

title: Best of AbuDhabi
text: One of the most beautiful places I have visited the mosque makes you feel peace inside. Its structure is to admire its marble corridors with its unique terminations make it super.

title: Perfect Holidays!!
text: Excellent Hotel good breakfast ,with the best location you can have in Dubai, the lobby staff always very attentive and willing to help in everything you need they give us the opportunity to check in early That‚Äôs a plus overall I recommend this hotel 100%

title: Good to see
text: Dubai fountains are the best I've seen anything compared to them, not Las Vegas are to nice to but not like Dubai one

title: Window Shopping
text: Nice place to hang out eat good food and see the Burj Khalifa tower and The Dancing Fountain good places around .

title: Good Greek Food
text: Thank you to Angelo find this place and was the best place that we eat and all my holidays went 2 times and the food was awesome the Drinks always cold nice restaurant to chill we friends the service super good all around was Great
